summary: Delinquent teen-agers ingest a substance and grow thirty feet tall, then proceed to take over a small town.
cast: Tommy Kirk|Johnny Crawford|Ron Howard|Joe Turkel|Beau Bridges|Joy Harmon|Robert Random|Gail Gilmore|Tisha Sterling|Tim Rooney|Kevin O'Neal|Charla Doherty|Toni Basil|Hank Jones|Jim Begg|Debi Storm|Rance Howard|Vicki London|The Beau Brummels|Ron Elliott|Ron Meagher|Declan Mulligan|John Peterson|Sal Valentino|Freddie Cannon|Mike Clifford|Higgins|Jonathan Kramer|Orangey|Christopher Riordan
title: El pueblo de los gigantes
